observation: Itrust Investments  Product Stocks and Funds Crypto Gold Cash Management Options Learn How to invest Who we Are About Us Our Commitments Investor Relations Blog Features Trading Bots Pro Tools Trailing Features Copy Trading Automated Trading AI Trading Get Funded F.A.Q Sign up Terms & Condition Privacy Policy Login World class automated stocks and crypto trading bot Become a better trader. Powerful, AI-powered stocks and crypto trading bot to help you save time, trade 24/7, and automate your trading. Get the best out of our Platform. Manage Your Portfolio Keep your portfolio in your pocket. Everything you need to manage your assets is available in a single app. Learn More Learn as You Grow Our goal is to make investing in financial markets more affordable, more intuitive, and more fun, no matter how much experience you have (or don’t have). Keep Tabs on Your Money Set up customized news and notifications to stay on top of your assets as casually or as relentlessly as you like. Controlling the flow of info is up to you. Our Features Copy other traders easily, or trade automatically with our unique trading A.I. Use tools like DCA, Market-Making, Arbitrage or our own free of charge charting software. Follow the price movement and sell/buy automatically when the price goes in another direction. Easy. Effective. World Class Use expert tools without coding skills Start copy trading for free! Don’t let the fear of a market shift keep you up at night. With our A.I., your bot can automatically recognize trends and switch to a better strategy. Bots don't need sleep. Bots don't need sleep. Cryptotrading is 24/7. So is your bot. Give yourself an edge, and while everyone else sleeps, you’ll never miss a beat. Let your bot learn and decide by itself A break-through innovation in trading - this is what the hedge-funds don’t want you to know. AI analyses all the strategies you feed it, and can decide on its own which one it should use. How It Works Introducing Fractional Shares Invest in thousands of stocks and cryptos with as little as $1. 01 Invest Any Amount Choose how much you want to invest, and we’ll convertfrom dollars to parts of a whole share. 02 Build a Balanced Portfolio Customize your portfolio with pieces of different stocks, cryptocurrencies and products to help reduce risk. 03 Trade in Real Time Trades placed during market hours are executed at that time, so you’ll always know the share price. Our Products Tap into the cryptocurrency market to buy, HODL, and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, and more, 24/7 with Itrust Crypto. Earn 13.30% APY* on your uninvested cash and get more flexibility with your brokerage account. Get mobile access to the markets. Invest commission-free in individual companies or bundles of investments (ETFs). Be bullish on stocks you believe in and bearish on the ones you don’t. It’s your call. Access research reports, trade on margin at a 12.5% annual rate, and make bigger deposits with quicker access to funds—all starting $50 per month. Happy Customers Don't take our word for it. See what customers are saying about us. “They are great and fast. I highly recommend this broker. You are welcome to check it out. They have training and good information for new clients. Excellent client relationship. Comparing to other brokers, this is the best. ” Elisha Allen, Texas “Itrust Investment has a good easy to use format. It has research tools as well as videos on how to use the site. They have helped online and also personal help by phone. Good service and low-cost commissions. ” William Leavenworth, KS “I got switched over to Itrust since my other company closed down. I was happy to see that Itrust is easy to work online and easy to understand, I am not that computer savvy, so it is very user friendly.” Mary Larkspur, CA “I am new at online trading. So after researching and asking around. I decided to online apply.. I have received superior service via mail and email, with an option to contact a specific person should the time come. ” Andy Salisbury, MD “Some personal service is available, but mostly the customer has to find his own answer and the TD Ameritrade website is quite excellent. If you can navigate a website you will be able to find out all the information that you may need. ” Anna Charleston, SC “They are always accessible, always right. Trades are done quickly and with good prices. I would highly recommend them. They have waived fees for some reorganizations but not all. A broker is available by phone if you have questions.” Jim Menifee, CA “Ready with help when I call. Webpages easy to understand and navigate. In addition, Itrust has a help desk one can access from the web. Overall, best I have used so far. One can easily print out statements or other information from this site.” Samuel Rancho Mirage, CA “Excellent choices with a great service. Value for the price is also very good. Some of the lowest fees for brokerage. Really flexible choices from a vast portfolio. We have had the account with them for a while and never complained. Solid background with solid choices.” Catalin Fort Thomas, KY “Always easy to contact, polite and no hidden fees, help is great. Documents are very easy to understand and access. Great experience. Their website is one of the best laid out and easy to navigate. I have ever used and I very highly recommend this company.” S. H. Soddy Daisy, TN Copy Bots Funding AI From Funding Traders NAN 30D Yield 100% Subscribe win rate 343.67M AMU (USDT) MonieBot From moniebot.com 421.83% 68.71% $829.78M SMART SWAN 163.83% 11.5% $518M From swing trader 212% 13.7% $317M PSAR V4 162.38% >13.06% $297M Join the Community We aim to give everyone access to the financial system, regardless of their background or bank account balance. That’s why we have uniform interest rates, no account minimums, and a product that was designed from the ground up for small accounts. Need Help? Terms of Use Our Blog Get in Touch 57 Stamford St London, London, SE1 9LX. United Kingdom info@itrustinvestment.com © 2021 Itrust Investment. All rights reserved.

thought: The website's text contains several red flags that align with characteristics of scam websites. There are promises of unusually high returns (13.30% APY), claims of easy and effective trading with AI and automated systems, and mentions of "copy trading for free," which could be enticing but unrealistic. The site also mentions access to financial markets with as little as $1, which might target psychological weaknesses by suggesting low-risk, high-reward opportunities.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered with a privacy service, which is not uncommon, but it can sometimes be used to hide the identity of the website owners. The website was created relatively recently, which could be a sign of a scam, but not necessarily. It's worth noting that the address provided is in Reykjavik, Iceland, which might not match the expected location for an investment firm. I will now check for any reviews or discussions online about this website.

thought: The search results provide mixed signals. While there are some positive reviews on Trustpilot, which could indicate a legitimate business, there is also a mention of a scam detector website, which suggests there might be concerns about the legitimacy of itrustinvestment.com. However, positive reviews on platforms like Trustpilot can sometimes be fabricated or paid for, and the presence on a scam detection site warrants further investigation. One review mentions discrepancies in amounts and trouble closing accounts, which are potential red flags. I will check for any recent discussions on social media to see if there are any recent scam reports or user experiences shared.

There are no recent Twitter posts related to itrustinvestment.com being a scam, which does not provide additional insights into the legitimacy of the website. However, the absence of mentions on Twitter does not necessarily indicate that the website is legitimate. I will now check Reddit for any discussions or user experiences that might provide further insights into the legitimacy of itrustinvestment.com.

There are no recent Reddit discussions related to itrustinvestment.com being a scam. With the information I've gathered so far, I have observed several red flags that align with characteristics of scam websites. The website promises unusually high returns, offers automated and AI trading systems, and promotes free copy trading, which could be enticing but potentially misleading. The WHOIS information shows the use of a privacy service and the website's relatively recent creation, which might be cause for concern. Mixed reviews were found online, with some positive feedback on Trustpilot but also a mention of a scam detection website. Additionally, there are complaints about discrepancies in accounts and difficulty closing accounts. Based on these observations, I am inclined to determine that the website is suspicious and may be a scam. However, without concrete evidence of fraudulent activities, such as confirmed reports of users being scammed, I cannot conclusively label it as such. Therefore, I will proceed with caution and suggest that potential users do thorough research and exercise due diligence before engaging with the website. I now know the final answer. The website itrustinvestment.com is suspicious and exhibits several characteristics of a scam website. However, without definitive proof of scam activities, it is recommended to approach with caution and conduct thorough research before any engagement.

observation.reason: The website promises unusually high returns features automated and AI trading systems and promotes free copy trading which are common characteristics of scam websites. WHOIS information shows the use of a privacy service and the site's recent creation date. There are mixed reviews online with some negative points raised such as discrepancies in account balances and difficulty closing accounts. No definitive proof of scam activities was found but the overall evidence suggests that the website is suspicious.
